Text: no this is a pc game
um, i don't recall there being a PC version of tekken 3...if there was then i completely missed it

a) T3 was NEVER released for PC.

b) The files in this torrent contain "ePSXe.exe" which is a PSX emulator.

c) The proper PSX ISO for Tekken 3 is around 650 MB, yet the one in this torrent is only 43 MB.
